newsitem.title: USA: SanDisk sees lower litigation costs.
newsitem.headline: SanDisk sees lower litigation costs.

text.p: SanDisk Corp said high litigation costs were significant during the third quarter, but are expected to decline.
"While litigation costs will remain significant, we project these costs to decline during the current quarter," the company said in a statement.
The litigation relates to SanDisk's action against Samsung Semiconductor. SanDisk expects a decision from the International Trade Commission during the third quarter.
